title: Why always 1024x768 in game?
body: This has happened since Monday. I didn't change anything and I used to have 1280x720 resolution in game. I hate changing the resolution everytime!!!!! How can I set 1280x720 as default? This should be my default setting!!! Thanks.

replies.body: Very odd that your game.cfg is set to something differnt that what its actually appearing on your screen as, maybe raise a support ticket, sounds like an odd issue.
I found that game.cfg height and width are 720 and 1280 but still 1024x768 in game :(

When your in game (not in the shop / chat application), click the settings button (from memory its just above the minimap) then go into visual settings and there will be a setting to change your resolution.
I don't want to change the resolution in game every time. I know it only takes me few seconds but this is annoying.
Is it just league having a different resolution or ur whole windows as well?
just league, my windows is always 1280X720
